Projects.name: Actsport
Projects.description: This project was a consulting job for a start-up called Actsport. The start-up is developing an application for sport psychology. The application had some design flaws from an interaction point of view. I helped the company to come up with a strategy on how to improve the app. I then created a prototype using Figma. I did tests on potential customers and some people from the local gym. The final prototype can be found in the link below.

Projects.name: Arboreal
Projects.description: As a part of a course we created and tested a prototpe useing Adobe XD

Projects.name: Typer
Projects.description: As a part of a course we created a game to race against your friends by typing. This used socket.io
